SpaRED
  • API
  • spared.processing.compute_patches_embeddings_and_predictions
  • View page source

spared.processing.compute_patches_embeddings_and_predictionsÔÉÅ

spared.processing.compute_patches_embeddings_and_predictions(adata: AnnData, backbone: str = 'densenet', model_path: str = 'None', preds: bool = True, patch_size: int = 224, patch_scale: float = 1.0) → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Compute embeddings or predictions for patches. This function computes embeddings or predictions for a given backbone model and adata object. It can optionally compute using a stored model in model_path or a pretrained model from pytorch. The embeddings or predictions are stored in adata.obsm[f‚Äôembeddings_{backbone}‚Äô] or adata.obsm[f‚Äôpredictions_{backbone}‚Äô] respectively. The patches must be stored in adata.obsm[f‚Äôpatches_scale_{patch_scale}‚Äô] and must be of shape (n_patches, patch_size*patch_size*3).

The function only modifies the AnnData object in place.

Parameters:

  • adata (ad.AnnData) ‚Äì The AnnData object to process.

  • backbone (str, optional) ‚Äì A string specifiying the backbone model to use. Must be one of the following [‚Äòresnet‚Äô, ‚Äòresnet50‚Äô, ‚ÄòConvNeXt‚Äô, ‚ÄòEfficientNetV2‚Äô, ‚ÄòInceptionV3‚Äô, ‚ÄòMaxVit‚Äô, ‚ÄòMobileNetV3‚Äô, ‚ÄòResNetXt‚Äô, ‚ÄòShuffleNetV2‚Äô, ‚ÄòViT‚Äô, ‚ÄòWideResnet‚Äô, ‚Äòdensenet‚Äô, ‚Äòswin‚Äô]. Defaults to ‚Äòdensenet‚Äô.

  • model_path (str, optional) ‚Äì The path to a stored model. If set to ‚ÄòNone‚Äô, then a pretrained model is used. Defaults to ‚ÄúNone‚Äù.

  • preds (bool, optional) ‚Äì True if predictions are to be computed, False if embeddings are to be computed. Defaults to True.

  • patch_size (int, optional) ‚Äì The size of the patches. Defaults to 224.

  • patch_scale (float, optional) ‚Äì The scale of the patches. Defaults to 1.0.

Raises:

ValueError ‚Äì If the backbone is not supported.
